title: Bug 124777 - Setting a blank tooltip in the chart title causes an exception during preview
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, an exception occurs during the preview.
EB: When the chart is previewed in the viewer and the mouse is moved over the chart title, nothing should happen. There should be no unexpected exception dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the chart in the viewer.
2. Move the mouse pointer over the chart title.
